titles.title: 353 I Am Trusting Thee Lord Jesus (easy tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am trusting
Thee Lord Jesus
Trusting only Thee
Trusting Thee
For full salvation
Great and free

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am trusting
Thee for pardon
At Thy feet I bow
For Thy grace
And tender mercy
Trusting now

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I am trusting
Thee for cleansing
In the crimson flood
Trusting Thee
To make me holy
By Thy blood

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I am trusting
Thee to guide me
Thou alone shalt lead
Every day
And hour supplying
All my need

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I am trusting
Thee for power
Thine can never fail
Words which Thou
Thyself shalt give me
Must prevail

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I am trusting
Thee Lord Jesus
Never let me fall
I am trusting
Thee for ever
And for all
